creator: fayland@gmail.com
text:
My OS is WinXP with SP2.
I tried 2.0.50 and 2.0.52 and apache_1.3.29-win32-x86-no_src.exe,It's the same.

the error.log shows:

[Fri Oct 29 18:12:36 2004] [error] Parent: child process exited with status 3 -
- Aborting.
[Fri Oct 29 18:12:36 2004] [notice] Parent: Created child process 844
[Fri Oct 29 18:12:36 2004] [notice] Child 844: Child process is running
[Fri Oct 29 18:12:36 2004] [crit] (OS 10022)提供了一个无效的参数。  : Child 844: 
setup_inherited_listeners(), WSASocket failed to open the inherited socket.

the middle word is Chinese,means 'An invalid argument was supplied'.
and i cann't open the http://localhost.

I does not install IIS or WinGate or any anti-virus software.
I tried to change the port to 90 or 8080
close the firewall and close the most services.
and Windowsupdate(included WindowsXP-KB884020).
without any help.

Thanks a lot.

creator: fayland@gmail.com
text:
I searched and got one finally.
http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=31765

and the last comment says 'Apache/XP-SP2 interaction problem isn't resolved; 
re-opening'.
waiting for the fix or new Apache.

Marking as duplicate if this is the same issue.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 31765 ***
creator: jorton@redhat.com
